bibl.title: The Judean Synagogues - As a Reflection of Alexandrine Architecture.
bibl.note: It is suggested that the synagogue design - a specific type of assembly-house - originated in Alexandria in the 3rd century B.C.

bibl.title: Alessandria e il mondo ellenistico-romano. I Centenario del Museo Greco-Romano. Alessandria, 23-27 Novembre 1992. Atti del II Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano

bibl.seg: MA'OZ Zvi 'Uri, The Judean Synagogues - As a Reflection of Alexandrine Architecture.

Alessandria e il mondo ellenistico-romano. I Centenario del Museo Greco-Romano. Alessandria, 23-27 Novembre 1992. Atti del II Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano (Roma, 1995) pp. 192-201, nombr. plans et pl. 22.
It is suggested that the synagogue design - a specific type of assembly-house - originated in Alexandria in the 3rd century B.C.
